title: Graph of deriv, semicircles and segments part - d

content.description: Let f be a function defined on the closed interval −5 ≤ x ≤ 5 with f(1)=3. The graph of f' the derivative of f, consists of two semicircles and two line segments, as shown above.
content.question: Find the absolute minimum value of f(x) over the closed interval −5 ≤ x ≤ 5 . Explain your reasoning.

frqParts.text: Find the absolute minimum value of f(x) over the closed interval −5 ≤ x ≤ 5 . Explain your reasoning.

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
